```pddl
[
  (:action mix ; Mix items and update state
    :parameters (?p - person ?item - object ?location - place)
    :precondition (and (at ?p ?location) (has ?p ?item))
    :effect (and (mixed ?item) (not (has ?p ?item)) (not (at ?p ?location)))
  ),
  
  (:action pour_into_container
    :parameters (?p - person ?mixture - mixture ?container - container)
    :precondition (and (at ?p kitchen) (mixed ?mixture) (has ?p ?mixture) (is_container ?container))
    :effect (and (in ?mixture ?container) (not (has ?p ?mixture)) (not (at ?p kitchen)))
  ),
  
  (:action pour
    :parameters (?actor - person ?substance - substance ?target - receptacle)
    :precondition (and (at ?actor ?location) (prepared ?substance) (has ?actor ?substance) (is_receptacle ?target))
    :effect (and (in ?substance ?target) (not (has ?actor ?substance)) (not (at ?actor ?location)))
  ),
  
  (:action grind ; Grind an item and update its state
    :parameters (?p - person ?item - object ?tool - tool)
    :precondition (and (at ?p kitchen) (has ?p ?item) (is_tool ?tool))
    :effect (and (ground ?item) (not (has ?p ?item)) (not (at ?p kitchen)))
  ),
  
  (:action gotolocation
    :parameters (?agent - person ?location - location)
    :precondition (and (at ?agent ?current_location) (connected ?current_location ?location))
    :effect (and (at ?agent ?location) (not (at ?agent ?current_location)))
  ),
  
  (:action process_ingredients
    :parameters (?agent - person ?ingredient - ingredient ?container - container ?tool - tool)
    :precondition (and (has ?agent ?ingredient) (available ?tool) (available ?container))
    :effect (and (processed ?ingredient ?tool) (in ?ingredient ?container) (not (has ?agent ?ingredient)))
  )
]
```
